name: Embracing Darkness [EN]
description:
日本語版はこちら

"Embracing Darkness" is a fan project in which players can enjoy a short encounter with Local Villains Tiefedorf and Shuraomaru.

To download the offline version of the game, head to the bottom of this page. To play the browser version on a phone, please use Firefox.

FEATURES
  •  Compatible with all systems via browser play and windows via download
  • Japanese & English
  • 3 scenarios
STORY

Shuraomaru's story

Every day, you get lunch at your favorite café, and you sit down at your favorite table to eat. This time, however, there's someone already on your seat when you get there, and he seems to be waiting for you...

Tiefedorf's story

After getting lost in the woods during a winter storm, you end up at a mysterious mansion. With nowhere else to turn to, you find yourself accepting the invitation of its owner to stay for tea...

Bonus Scenario

Ever since you inherited your grandfather's mystic shop, you've been used to dealing with all kinds of phantoms and shady figures. But there's something about two of your newest clients you can't quite put your finger on..

CREDITS

Scenario - Killer Queen

Character art - Avetetsuya Studios

GUI - Kathaeris

Background art - Son Huynh, Minikle

Japanese translation - Celeste SG

All characters featured belong to their respective owners.
